attention_tracker.comment: Property setter is for handling sort, we do +1 so that those without resource at least sorted above those without resource

callback_with_context.context_function_id: (min_value = transaction.AbsoluteValue, max_value = SaylManipulations.GetMaxManipulationCostForTier(ritual.RitualContext.SortOrder)) => GetIfElse(min_value == max_value, Format("%d", min_value), Format("%d - %d", min_value, max_value))

(min_value = transaction.AbsoluteValue, max_value = SaylManipulations.GetMaxManipulationCostForTier(ritual.RitualContext.SortOrder)) => GetIfElse(min_value == max_value, Format("%d", min_value), Format("%d - %d", min_value, max_value))

(min_value = transaction.AbsoluteValue, max_value = SaylManipulations.GetMaxManipulationCostForTier(ritual.RitualContext.SortOrder)) => GetIfElse(min_value == max_value, Format("%d", min_value), Format("%d - %d", min_value, max_value))

component_text.text: [ph]The following agent will spawn at your faction capital:

callback_with_context.context_function_id: this | SaylManipulations.IsManipulationRitualUnlocked(this) == false => InvalidRitualReason | CanAfford == false => Loc("cotw_cannot_afford") | ""

mouseover_blocker.comment: blocks mouse detection for bottom 2 px rows to prevent mouseon/off anim glitch
